name: When User searches with Latitude and Longitudes, the API responds with all the near by locations. -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User has Latitude and Longitude information
When User calls the API with Latitude and Longitude details 36.96,-122.02
Then API returns the following details of all the locations near by 36.96,-122.02: distance, title, location_type, woeid, latt_long

fullName: FeatureLocationSearch/LocationSearch.feature:When User searches with Latitude and Longitudes, the API responds with all the near by locations.
